description:
A lightweight merino bike short liner with low profile padding. Made for after work hot laps, or for those who want less bulk.

Merino Air-Con is ultra-lite and ultra-breathable for year-round use.
name: Mons Royale Low Pro Bike Short Liner - Mens

specs.value: Merino Air-Con - 83% Merino Wool, 13% Nylon, 4% Elastane - 140gsm
